goal.ch:
實驗物理課程為物理系學生學習實驗物理的基礎入門課程，共為期兩年。以課堂講授、發表、與討論，配合實驗室進行實驗系統建構與量測，課後進行分析與報告撰寫。以培養學生從事基礎實驗物理動手能力，與研究所需基本態度與方法學訓練為基礎理念。

將透過此連貫課程，對學生進行實驗探索方法學的基礎訓練：如自我與團隊自主學習、系統思維與辯證、電子、機械、電腦、英文等實驗工具操控、口頭與書面論述、團隊合作等方法學鍛鍊。
goal.en: The goal of the two year courses is to train the basic altitude, the methodology, the basic knowledge background of conducting experimental physics research. The former focuses on the self-learning, oral and written presentation, discussion and dialectics in the classroom. The latter focuses on the hand-on experiments in the laboratory.  The basic methodology for experimental physics exploration will be emphasized and practiced. It includes: self- and group independent study, systematic thinking and dialectics, oral and written presentations, team works and management, and manipulating tools such as electronics, computer, machine shop skills, English and mathematics, etc..

outline.ch: 第二學期教授數位系統軟硬體基本理論，並進行電腦軟體撰寫，介面控制，類比-數位與數位- 類比轉換，數位資料分析，電腦模擬等軟硬體建構， 機械工廠基礎操作，及上述項目統整之實驗系統建構，與實驗執行。於下半學期每組學生須自行設計與完成一數位電路系統裝置。第二學期期末指定數十當代物理實驗技術題目，要求學生於其中自選題目，於暑假期間進行文獻調查，準備第三學期初該技術的口頭報告，並於暑假對下學期將進行各式複擺實驗進行設計，與研究複擺所需的非線性動力學背景知識研讀。
outline.en:
The second semester course includes:
Logic circuit design, computer programming, numerical simulation, interface control, AC-DC and DC-AC conversion, digital signal processing and analysis, and basic machines shop skills.
In the second half of the semester, students have to design and construct an electro-mechanical system which can integrate the analog and digital electronics, interface, computer programming and machine shop works learned in the first and the second semesters.

gradMethod.ch:
學生以二至三人為組，每週與課前需就教師指定進度進行預習、小組討論、及書面報告撰寫。書面報告須涵蓋前次上課內容總結、實驗成果、與下次上課內容預報，實驗設計。

教室與實驗課表現、每週報告之評分，將佔總成績70%，期中與期末報告將佔 30%。
gradMethod.en:
Each team has to  hand in a preview report about the content and design their own experiment conducted in the next week, write a review report of the experiment conducted in the last week, and write a brief summary about the basic knowledge learned in the last class.  

Evaluation standard
Class and lab performances, weakly report   70%
mid-term and final report 30%
